# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ioredis`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for ioredis (https://github.com/luin/ioredis).

Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/ioredis
